Plot: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani is the story of the relationship between two characters, Bunny (Ranbir Kapoor) & Naina (Deepika Padukone), at two separate but defining times in their lives... first...
Title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
Actors: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone, Aditya Roy Kapoor, Kalki Koechlin
Writer: Hussain Dalal (dialogue), Ayan Mukherjee (story and screenplay)
